com.cloudia.Database

Class CloudiaDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.cloudia.Database.CloudiaDB

  • public class CloudiaDB
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Database manager. Manages the creation and the requests for the local sqlite database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CloudiaDB(Context c)
      Constructor Takes and keeps a reference of the passed context in order to access to the application assets and resources.
